name: Miabella 1-1/4 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Cross-Over Ring

reviews.name: Miabella 1-1/4 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Cross-Over Ring
reviews.reviewText: This is my first jewelry purchase from Walmart. I wanted to buy a diamond that I saw on Walmart.com but it was sold out. When searching for another ring I found this white sapphire ring. I was wondering how it would look, would it look like a fake diamond, a sapphire or what? When I received my ring, I opened the box and to my surprise this wonderful looking ring was inside. I put it on immedately, boy was I smiling! This ring is absolutely beautiful, it LOOKS JUST LIKE DIAMONDS. I would definitely recommend this ring. I am looking at it right now and it is shiny, and sparkling in the light. The picture on the site does not do it any justice. I am sooo glad I decided to take a chance on this ring. Thanks sooooo much Walmart.com! OH P.S. I Ordered another white sapphire ring, it is a little larger. I am very excited. I will tell you about it a little later ;o).
reviews.title: Beautiful White Sapphire Ring!

reviews.name: Miabella 1-1/4 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Cross-Over Ring
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant at first but I ordered this ring to wear instead of my bulky wedding ring. It's shiny and looks really pretty on. It looks real, not like sterling silver.
reviews.title: It looks really pretty on

reviews.name: Miabella 1-1/4 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Cross-Over Ring
reviews.reviewText: Love this ring, gorgeously crafted, blings awesome in the sun!
reviews.title: beautiful ring, well worth its price

reviews.name: Miabella 1-1/4 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Cross-Over Ring
reviews.reviewText: This ring is very dull looking. I was expecting more shine to it!
reviews.title: Doesn't shine

reviews.name: Miabella 1-1/4 Carat T.G.W. White Sapphire Sterling Silver Cross-Over Ring
reviews.reviewText: I bought this ring, because I recently lost my Dad & I wanted something to wear that represented him. It is a very beautiful piece of jewelry! The picture doesn't do it justice at all. When my ring arrived it was packaged in a pretty box, when I opened it I was very impressed with the quality of the ring. It is an excellent value! I would recommend this ring to anyone.
reviews.title: Dazzling Stars
